options.content:
# Monthly Budget Cockpit - Decision-Ready Budget Dashboard

**What This Dashboard Shows:** Budget performance with pace tracking, spending classification, and recommended adjustments for the next month.

**Key Metrics Explained:**
- **Pace Tracker:** Daily spending target vs actual burn rate
- **Fixed vs Discretionary:** Distinguish flexible vs committed spending
- **Budget Adjustments:** Recommendations based on recent overruns
- **Monthly Summary:** Income/expense trends and savings rate tracking
- **Category Breakdown:** Major expense areas (mortgage, household, food, family)

**Time Windows:**
- Summary KPIs use the most recent complete month.
- YTD panels reflect year-to-date totals.
- Trend charts cover the trailing 12 months.

**How to Use:** Check daily pace tracker to adjust discretionary spending. Review budget adjustments monthly to stay ahead of overrun patterns.

panels.description: Data recency for the current dashboard context.

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
)
SELECT
  to_char((SELECT month_date FROM latest_period), 'Mon YYYY') AS "Data Through",
  to_char(MAX(report_generated_at), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "Last Refresh"
FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period);

panels.title: Data Freshness

panels.description: MOST RECENT COMPLETE MONTH (August 2025): Income vs expenses data excludes current incomplete month for accurate quarterly review

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  total_income,
  total_expenses,
  net_cash_flow
FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY budget_year DESC, budget_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Last Complete Month Summary

panels.description: Savings rate and expense ratio for last complete month (scaled 0â€“100%, negatives allowed)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  savings_rate_percent,
  expense_ratio_percent
FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY budget_year DESC, budget_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Savings Rate & Expense Ratio

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') as time,
  total_income,
  total_expenses,
  rolling_3m_avg_income,
  rolling_3m_avg_expenses
FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY budget_year, budget_month;

panels.description: Breakdown of expenses by major categories

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  mortgage_expenses,
  household_expenses,
  food_expenses,
  family_expenses
FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY budget_year DESC, budget_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Last Complete Month Expense Categories

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  total_transactions,
  income_transaction_count,
  expense_transaction_count,
  avg_expense_amount
FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY budget_year DESC, budget_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
  ytd_income,
  ytd_expenses,
  ytd_net_cash_flow
FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY budget_year DESC, budget_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.description: Monthly net cash flow progression through the year

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') as time,
  net_cash_flow
FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY budget_year, budget_month;

panels.title: Monthly Net Cash Flow

panels.description: Current month pace tracker - daily spend target vs actual burn rate

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  daily_expense_target,
  actual_daily_burn_rate,
  mtd_expenses,
  current_day_of_month,
  days_remaining,
  pace_status,
  ROUND(pace_vs_target_ratio, 2) as pace_ratio,
  ROUND(projected_month_end_expenses, 2) as projected_end_expenses,
  ROUND(mtd_variance_from_target, 2) as mtd_variance
FROM reporting.rpt_budget_cockpit_pace_tracker;

panels.title: Current Month Pace Tracker

panels.description: Fixed vs Discretionary spending split with variance analysis for last complete month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  spending_type as "Type",
  ROUND(amount, 2) as "Amount",
  total_transactions as "Transactions",
  ROUND(avg_transaction_size, 2) as "Avg Size",
  ROUND(pct_of_total_spending, 1) as "% of Total",
  ROUND(rolling_3m_avg, 2) as "3m Avg",
  ROUND(variance_from_historical_avg, 2) as "Variance $",
  variance_assessment as "Assessment"
FROM reporting.rpt_budget_cockpit_fixed_vs_discretionary
WHERE budget_year_month = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month', 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN spending_type = 'Fixed' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
  amount DESC;

panels.title: Fixed vs Discretionary Spending

panels.description: Budget adjustment recommendations based on recent spending patterns and overruns

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  level_1_category as "Category",
  months_of_consecutive_overspend as "Consecutive Months",
  ROUND(suggested_budget_amount, 0) as "Suggested Budget",
  ROUND(total_overspend, 0) as "Total Overspend",
  ROUND(reduction_pct, 1) as "Reduction %",
  adjustment_rationale as "Rationale",
  priority
FROM reporting.rpt_budget_cockpit_adjustment_suggestions
ORDER BY priority ASC, total_overspend DESC;

panels.title: Budget Adjustments for Next Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  budget_year_month as "Month",
  total_income as "Income",
  total_expenses as "Expenses",
  net_cash_flow as "Net Cash Flow",
  ROUND(savings_rate_percent, 1) as "Savings Rate %",
  ROUND(expense_ratio_percent, 1) as "Expense Ratio %",
  total_transactions as "Transactions"
FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY budget_year DESC, budget_month DESC 
LIMIT 12;

panels.description: Budget targets vs actual spending with variance deltas for income and expenses

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  total_income,
  target_income,
  ROUND(income_variance_delta, 2) as income_variance_delta,
  income_variance_pct,
  total_expenses,
  target_expenses,
  ROUND(expense_variance_delta, 2) as expense_variance_delta,
  expense_variance_pct,
  expense_status
FROM reporting.rpt_budget_variance_summary 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY budget_year DESC, budget_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Budget vs Actual (Last Complete Month)

panels.description: Heatmap showing top spending categories with over/under budget status

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  category_name,
  category_expenses,
  target_expenses,
  variance_delta,
  variance_pct,
  budget_status,
  transaction_count
FROM reporting.rpt_category_budget_heatmap 
WHERE budget_year_month = (
  SELECT MAX(budget_year_month) FROM reporting.rpt_category_budget_heatmap
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') < date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)
)
ORDER BY spending_rank ASC;

panels.title: Category Budget Heatmap (Top 10)

panels.description: Suggested budget adjustments for next month based on historical patterns

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  adjustment_priority,
  suggestion_text,
  recommended_action,
  current_savings_rate_pct,
  potential_monthly_savings
FROM reporting.rpt_budget_adjustment_suggestions 
ORDER BY 
  CASE adjustment_priority WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1 WHEN 'High' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END,
  potential_monthly_savings DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: Suggested Budget Adjustments

panels.description: Month-over-month expense variance drivers: categories with >10% change and >$100 absolute variance

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_two_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY budget_year_month DESC) as rn
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
  GROUP BY budget_year_month
  ORDER BY budget_year_month DESC
  LIMIT 2
),
current_month_data AS (
  SELECT level_1_category, SUM(monthly_spending) as amount
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends
  WHERE budget_year_month = (SELECT budget_year_month FROM latest_two_months WHERE rn = 1)
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
    AND monthly_spending > 0
  GROUP BY level_1_category
),
prior_month_data AS (
  SELECT level_1_category, SUM(monthly_spending) as amount
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends
  WHERE budget_year_month = (SELECT budget_year_month FROM latest_two_months WHERE rn = 2)
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
    AND monthly_spending > 0
  GROUP BY level_1_category
)
SELECT
  c.level_1_category as category,
  c.amount as current_month,
  COALESCE(p.amount, 0) as prior_month,
  (c.amount - COALESCE(p.amount, 0)) as variance_dollars,
  CASE 
    WHEN COALESCE(p.amount, 0) = 0 THEN 100.0
    ELSE ROUND((c.amount - COALESCE(p.amount, 0)) / COALESCE(p.amount, 1) * 100, 1)
  END as variance_percent
FROM current_month_data c
LEFT JOIN prior_month_data p ON c.level_1_category = p.level_1_category
WHERE ABS(c.amount - COALESCE(p.amount, 0)) >= 100
  AND ABS(CASE WHEN COALESCE(p.amount, 0) = 0 THEN 100.0 ELSE (c.amount - COALESCE(p.amount, 0)) / COALESCE(p.amount, 1) * 100 END) >= 10
ORDER BY ABS(c.amount - COALESCE(p.amount, 0)) DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: MoM Budget Variance Drivers (>10% & >$100)

panels.description: Top 5 transactions for the highest variance category MoM

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_two_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY budget_year_month DESC) as rn
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
  GROUP BY budget_year_month
  ORDER BY budget_year_month DESC
  LIMIT 2
),
variance_categories AS (
  SELECT level_1_category, ABS(SUM(CASE WHEN budget_year_month = (SELECT budget_year_month FROM latest_two_months WHERE rn = 1) THEN monthly_spending ELSE -COALESCE(monthly_spending, 0) END)) as variance
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends
  WHERE budget_year_month IN (SELECT budget_year_month FROM latest_two_months)
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
  GROUP BY level_1_category
  ORDER BY variance DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  DATE(f.transaction_date) as transaction_date,
  f.merchant_name as merchant,
  ABS(f.amount) as amount,
  f.category_l1 as category
FROM transformation.fct_transactions f
WHERE f.category_l1 = (SELECT level_1_category FROM variance_categories)
  AND DATE_TRUNC('month', f.transaction_date) = (SELECT TO_DATE(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM latest_two_months WHERE rn = 1)
ORDER BY ABS(f.amount) DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: Top 5 Transactions - Highest Variance Category

panels.description: Year-over-year expense variance drivers: categories with >10% change and >$100 absolute variance

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_month AS (
  SELECT MAX(budget_year_month) AS budget_year_month
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
),
prior_year_month AS (
  SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1 year', 'YYYY-MM') AS budget_year_month
  FROM latest_month
),
current_year_month AS (
  SELECT level_1_category, SUM(monthly_spending) as amount
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends
  WHERE budget_year_month = (SELECT budget_year_month FROM latest_month)
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
    AND monthly_spending > 0
  GROUP BY level_1_category
),
prior_year_month_data AS (
  SELECT level_1_category, SUM(monthly_spending) as amount
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends
  WHERE budget_year_month = (SELECT budget_year_month FROM prior_year_month)
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
    AND monthly_spending > 0
  GROUP BY level_1_category
)
SELECT
  c.level_1_category as category,
  c.amount as current_year,
  COALESCE(p.amount, 0) as prior_year,
  (c.amount - COALESCE(p.amount, 0)) as variance_dollars,
  CASE 
    WHEN COALESCE(p.amount, 0) = 0 THEN 100.0
    ELSE ROUND((c.amount - COALESCE(p.amount, 0)) / COALESCE(p.amount, 1) * 100, 1)
  END as variance_percent
FROM current_year_month c
LEFT JOIN prior_year_month_data p ON c.level_1_category = p.level_1_category
WHERE ABS(c.amount - COALESCE(p.amount, 0)) >= 100
  AND ABS(CASE WHEN COALESCE(p.amount, 0) = 0 THEN 100.0 ELSE (c.amount - COALESCE(p.amount, 0)) / COALESCE(p.amount, 1) * 100 END) >= 10
ORDER BY ABS(c.amount - COALESCE(p.amount, 0)) DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: YoY Budget Variance Drivers (>10% & >$100)

panels.description: Top 5 transactions for the highest variance category YoY

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_month AS (
  SELECT MAX(budget_year_month) AS budget_year_month
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
),
prior_year_month AS (
  SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1 year', 'YYYY-MM') AS budget_year_month
  FROM latest_month
),
comparison_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month FROM latest_month
  UNION ALL
  SELECT budget_year_month FROM prior_year_month
),
variance_categories AS (
  SELECT level_1_category, 
    ABS(SUM(CASE WHEN budget_year_month = (SELECT budget_year_month FROM latest_month) THEN monthly_spending ELSE -COALESCE(monthly_spending, 0) END)) as variance
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends
  WHERE budget_year_month IN (SELECT budget_year_month FROM comparison_months)
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
  GROUP BY level_1_category
  ORDER BY variance DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  DATE(f.transaction_date) as transaction_date,
  f.merchant_name as merchant,
  ABS(f.amount) as amount,
  f.category_l1 as category
FROM transformation.fct_transactions f
WHERE f.category_l1 = (SELECT level_1_category FROM variance_categories)
  AND DATE_TRUNC('month', f.transaction_date) = (SELECT TO_DATE(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM latest_month)
ORDER BY ABS(f.amount) DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: Top 5 Transactions - Highest Variance Category (YoY)
